changeSet.author: irazin
changeSet.comment: Add Tissue Block and Tissue Glass container types
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO `prodlims`.`containertype` (`name`, `displayname`) VALUES ('Tissue Block', 'Tissue Block'), ('Tissue Glass', 'Tissue Glass');
changeSet.rollback: DELETE FROM `prodlims`.`containertype` WHERE name IN ('Tissue Block', 'Tissue Glass');
